400,000 people online. When Larry Page and Co-founder Sergey Brin started Google, they envisioned a company that was more socially conscious and responsive than most corporations. That outlook was famously expressed by Google's unofficial motto, Don't be evil. In recent years, under Eric Schmidt 's leadership, the motto had become a popular punch line for a joke. She also wished her ex and his fiancee, Kayte Walsh, love and happiness in their new marriage.
